remarks: A strict weak order is a partial order.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Jul-2014.)
statement:
swopo.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( y e. A /\ z e. A ) ) -> ( y R z -> -. z R y ) ) $.
swopo.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. A /\ y e. A /\ z e. A ) ) -> ( x R y -> ( x R z \/ z R y ) ) ) $.
swopo $p |- ( ph -> R Po A ) $.
$d A x y z $.
$d R x y z $.
$d ph x y z $.
